title: Calculate Date Difference
description: In this lab, you will learn how to calculate the difference between two dates in days using the `datetime` module in Python.

meta.description: Learn how to calculate the number of days between two dates using Python's datetime module.
meta.keywords: days, date difference, python, programming tutorial, datetime
